description: Support to Devolution Trust for Community Empowerment

subproject.corporate outcome: 1. National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services and support conflict reduction2.Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description: 1. Institutional Capacity Building of DTCE.  2. Capacity building of all the stakeholders and partners to ensure successful implementation and sustainability of DTCE. 3. Effective Community participation in local governacne. 4.Promotion and assistance to voluntary associations of local nazims and councilors at district, tehsil, and union levels. (These are four outputs of the project that have been combined into one)
